XXbst-108u:214: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 1:
XXbst-108u:215: Adhyardhaśatakaṃ nāma stotram ācāryamātṛceṭaviracitam (Prasādapratibhodhava = Śatapañcāśatka of Mātṛceṭa)
XXbst-108u:217: sarvadā sarvathā sarve yasya doṣā na santi ha /
XXbst-108u:218: sarve sarvābhisāreṇa yatra cāvasthitā guṇāḥ // BuSto_1.1 //
XXbst-108u:219: tameva śaraṇaṃ gantuṃ taṃ stotuṃ tamupāsitum /
XXbst-108u:220: tasyaiva śāsane sthātuṃ nyāyyaṃ yadyasti cetanā // BuSto_1.2 //
XXbst-108u:221: savāsanāśca te doṣā na santyekasya tāyinaḥ /
XXbst-108u:222: sarve sarvavidaḥ santi guṇāste cānapāyinaḥ // BuSto_1.3 //
XXbst-108u:228: āttasārāṃ kariṣyāmi kathaṃ nemāṃ sarasvatīm // BuSto_1.6 //
XXbst-108u:232: yasya saṃkhyāprabhāvābhyāṃ na guṇeṣvasti niścayaḥ // BuSto_1.8 //
XXbst-108u:233: iyanta iti nāstyanta īdṛśā iti kā kathā /
XXbst-108u:234: puṇyā ityeva tu guṇānprati te mukharā vayam // BuSto_1.9 //
XXbst-108u:241: prāṇairapi tvayā sādho mānitaḥ praṇayī janaḥ // BuSto_1.12 //
XXbst-108u:249: kleśeṣu vivṛtaṃ tejo janaḥ kliṣṭo 'nukampitaḥ // BuSto_1.16 //
XXbst-108u:250: parārthe tyajataḥ prāṇān yā prītirabhavat tava /
XXbst-108u:251: na sā naṣṭopalabdheṣu prāṇeṣu prāṇināṃ bhavet // BuSto_1.17 //
XXbst-108u:255: tvameva vīra sārajño dūre tasyetaro janaḥ // BuSto_1.19 //
XXbst-108u:256: nākṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma durlabhaṃ labhyate padam /
XXbst-108u:261: na te nityānubaddhasya mahākaruṇayā hṛdi // BuSto_1.22 //
XXbst-108u:265: tvayā sūktaṃ duruktaṃ tu viṣavat parivarjitam // BuSto_1.24 //
XXbst-108u:267: parākrāntaṃ tvayā bodhau tāsu tāsūpapattiṣu // BuSto_1.25 //
XXbst-108u:272: agatvā sadṛśaiḥ spardhāṃ tvaṃ loke śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ // BuSto_1.27 //
XXbst-108u:274: tena samyakpratipadā tvayi niṣṭhāṃ guṇā gatāḥ // BuSto_1.28 //
XXbst-108u:278: guṇāstena sunītena parāṃ siddhiṃ tvamadhyagāḥ // BuSto_1.30 //
XXbst-108u:286: anuttarāṇāṃ kā tarhi guṇānāmupamā 'stu te // BuSto_1.34 //
XXbst-108u:292: na ravirviṣaye bhūmiṃ khādyotimapi vindati // BuSto_1.37 //
XXbst-108u:294: tava vāgbuddhiceṣṭānāṃ śuddhiṃ prati viśuddhayaḥ // BuSto_1.38 //
XXbst-108u:295: anena sarvaṃ vyākhyātaṃ yat kiñcitsādhu laukikam /
XXbst-108u:298: tenaiva kevalaṃ sādho sāmyaṃ te tasya ca tvayā // BuSto_1.40 //
XXbst-108u:303: sarvaṃ cāvarjitaṃ māravijayaṃ prati te jagat // BuSto_1.42 //
XXbst-108u:307: tasyāmeva kṛtaṃ rātrau tadeva paramādbhutam // BuSto_1.44 //
XXbst-108u:309: vīra vismayamāgacchet sa tīrthyavijaye tava // BuSto_1.45 //
XXbst-108u:313: anurodhavirodhau ca na staḥ sadasatostava // BuSto_1.47 //
XXbst-108u:315: yasya te cetaso 'nyatvaṃ tasya te kā stutirbhavet // BuSto_1.48 //
XXbst-108u:316: guṇeṣvapi na saṃgo 'bhūt tṛṣṇā na guṇavatsvapi /
XXbst-108u:317: aho te suprasannasya sattvasya pariśuddhatā // BuSto_1.49 //
XXbst-108u:319: mano nityaprasannaṃ te pratyakṣamiva dṛśyate // BuSto_1.50 //
XXbst-108u:323: 5 rupastavaḥ upaśāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca dīptamapratighāti ca /
XXbst-108u:324: nibhṛtaṃ corjitaṃ cedaṃ rupaṃ kamiva nākṣipet // BuSto_1.52 //
XXbst-108u:326: rupaṃ prīṇāti te cakṣuḥ samaṃ tadubhayorapi // BuSto_1.53 //
XXbst-108u:328: darśane darśane prītiṃ vidadhāti navāṃ navām // BuSto_1.54 //
XXbst-108u:337: tvaṃ jagatkleśamokṣārthaṃ baddhaḥ karuṇayā ciram // BuSto_1.58 //
XXbst-108u:338: kaṃ nu prathamato vande tvāṃ mahākaruṇāmuta /
XXbst-108u:341: kālā labdhaprasarayā tat te karuṇayā kṛtam // BuSto_1.60 //
XXbst-108u:342: śāntādaraṇyād grāmāntaṃ tvaṃ hi nāga iva hradāt /
XXbst-108u:349: tvayyeva kevalaṃ nātha karuṇā karuṇābhavat // BuSto_1.64 //
XXbst-108u:350: tathā hi kṛtvā śatadhā dhīrā balimiva kvacit /
XXbst-108u:353: tathā hi bādhamānāpi tvāṃ satī nāparādhyate // BuSto_1.66 //
XXbst-108u:355: 7 vacanastavaḥ supadāni mahārthāni tathyāni madhurāṇi ca /
XXbst-108u:358: tvayi pratihatasyāpi sarvajña iti niścayaḥ // BuSto_1.68 //
XXbst-108u:360: vākyaṃ tavārthasiddhayā tu sarvameva subhāṣitam // BuSto_1.69 //
XXbst-108u:362: sarvamaivaikarasatāṃ vimarde yāti te vacaḥ // BuSto_1.70 //
XXbst-108u:366: mukhāt kṣarati te vākyaṃ candrāddravamivāmṛtam // BuSto_1.72 //
XXbst-108u:372: gamakaṃ suprayuktatvāt trikalyāṇaṃ hi te vacaḥ // BuSto_1.75 //
XXbst-108u:374: tato vimṛśyamānāni rajāṃsi ca tamāṃsi ca // BuSto_1.76 //
XXbst-108u:376: saṃvejanaṃ ca sukhināṃ yogavāhi vacastava // BuSto_1.77 //
XXbst-108u:378: timiraghnaṃ ca mandānāṃ sārvajanyamidaṃ vacaḥ // BuSto_1.78 //
XXbst-108u:380: doṣān niṣkarṣati guṇān vākyaṃ te 'bhipravarṣati // BuSto_1.79 //
XXbst-108u:382: avandhyaṃ tena sarvatra sarvaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tava // BuSto_1.80 //
XXbst-108u:389: mataṃ yadi vigarhanti nāsti dṛṣṭisamo ripuḥ // BuSto_1.83 //
XXbst-108u:391: tat saṃsmṛtya virupe 'pi stheyaṃ te śāsane bhavet // BuSto_1.84 //
XXbst-108u:393: kathaṃ na nāma kāryaṃ syādādīptaśirasāpi te // BuSto_1.85 //
XXbst-108u:397: āśvāsanaṃ nṛdevānāṃ tavedaṃ vīra śāsanam // BuSto_1.87 //
XXbst-108u:401: prayāti tatra tu svairī yatra mṛtyoragocaraḥ // BuSto_1.89 //
XXbst-108u:405: śāsanaṃ nādriyante yat kiṃ vaiśasataraṃ tataḥ // BuSto_1.91 //
XXbst-108u:407: 9 praṇidhistavaḥ śravaṇaṃ tarpayati te prasādayati darśanam /
XXbst-108u:408: vacanaṃ hlādayati te vimocayati śāsanam // BuSto_1.92 //
XXbst-108u:416: tvaṃ prajñāsampadā 'kṣobhyo hradaḥ puṇyamayo mahān // BuSto_1.96 //
XXbst-108u:435: raudreṣvapi kṛpālutvaṃ kā nāmeyaṃ tavāryatā // BuSto_1.105 //
XXbst-108u:445: tvayā hi bhagavan dharmasarvātithyamidaṃ kṛtam // BuSto_1.110 //
XXbst-108u:447: upāsate prāñjalayaḥ śrāvakānapi te surāḥ // BuSto_1.111 //
XXbst-108u:454: kā nāmāsau bhagavati buddhānāṃ buddhadharmatā // BuSto_1.114 //
XXbst-108u:456: panthāno viṣamāḥ kṣuṇṇāḥ suptaṃ gokaṇṭakeṣvapi // BuSto_1.115 //
XXbst-108u:458: nātha vaineyavātsalyāt prabhuṇāpi satā tvayā // BuSto_1.116 //
XXbst-108u:459: prabhūtamapi te nātha sadā nātmani vidyate /
XXbst-108u:460: vaktavya iva sarvairhi svairaṃ svārthe niyujyase // BuSto_1.117 //
XXbst-108u:461: yena kena cideva tvaṃ yatra tatra yathā tathā /
XXbst-108u:462: coditaḥ svāṃ pratipadaṃ kalyāṇīṃ nātivartase // BuSto_1.118 //
XXbst-108u:468: tatrābhūdabhisaṃyānaṃ sadayaṃ sāmṛtaṃ ca te // BuSto_1.121 //
XXbst-108u:469: akroṣṭāro jitāḥ kṣāntyā drugdhāḥ svastyayanena ca /
XXbst-108u:477: kṣamitvaṃ cāṅgulīmāle kaṃ na vismayamānayet // BuSto_1.125 //
XXbst-108u:479: aśerata sukhaṃ dhīrāstṛptā dharmarasasya te // BuSto_1.126 //
XXbst-108u:483: tato dharmo gatamale vastre raṅga ivārpitaḥ // BuSto_1.128 //
XXbst-108u:484: na so 'styupāyaḥ śaktirvā yena na vyāyataṃ tava /
XXbst-108u:487: vineyāśayabhedena tatra tatra gatāni te // BuSto_1.130 //
XXbst-108u:489: sarvāṇyeva nṛdevānāṃ hitāni mahitāni ca // BuSto_1.131 //
XXbst-108u:490: na hi vaktuṃ ca kartuṃ ca bahu sādhu ca śakyate /
XXbst-108u:493: yasmānnaivaṃvidhaṃ kṣetraṃ triṣu lokeṣu vidyate // BuSto_1.133 //
XXbst-108u:497: 13 ānṛṇyastavaḥ na tāṃ pratipadaṃ vedmi syādyayāpacitistava /
XXbst-108u:498: api ye parinirvānti te 'pi te nānṛṇā janāḥ // BuSto_1.135 //
XXbst-108u:499: tava te 'vasthitā dharme svārthameva tu kurvate /
XXbst-108u:500: yaḥ śramastannimittaṃ tu tava kā tasya niṣkṛtiḥ // BuSto_1.136 //
XXbst-108u:506: karaṇīyaṃ bhaved yatra na dattānunayo bhavān // BuSto_1.139 //
XXbst-108u:507: yadi saṃcāriṇo dharmāḥ syurime niyataṃ tvayā /
XXbst-108u:510: iti tvamuktavān bhūtaṃ jagat saṃjñāpayanniva // BuSto_1.141 //
XXbst-108u:514: ṛṇaśeṣaṃ kimadyāpi sattveṣu yadabhūt tava // BuSto_1.143 //
XXbst-108u:520: tilaśo rupakāyaṃ ca bhittvāsi parinirvṛtaḥ // BuSto_1.146 //
XXbst-108u:524: tvayyapi pratihanyante paśya mohasya raudratām // BuSto_1.148 //
XXbst-108u:526: ye tvāṃ sattvā namasyanti tebhyo 'pi sukṛtaṃ namaḥ // BuSto_1.149 //
XXbst-108u:527: akṣayāste guṇā nātha śaktistu kṣayiṇī mama /
XXbst-108u:528: ataḥ prasaṅgabhīrutvāt sthīyate na vitṛptitaḥ // BuSto_1.150 //
XXbst-108u:531: na te guṇāṃśāvayavo 'pi kīrtitaḥ parā ca nastuṣṭiravasthitā hṛdi /
XXbst-108u:532: akarśanenaiva mahāhradāmbhasāṃ janasya tarṣāḥ praśamaṃ vrajanti ha //
XXbst-108u:538: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 2:
XXbst-108u:539: Ādibuddhadvādaśakastotram om nama ādibuddhāya namaste buddharūpāya dharmarūpāya te namaḥ /
XXbst-108u:553: rūpāya jaṅgamānāṃ te sthāvarāṇāṃ ca murtaye /
XXbst-108u:556: bhavyāya vṛddharūpāya bālāya te namo namaḥ // BuSto_2.9 //
XXbst-108u:562: nairvāṇāya namastubhyaṃ bahurūpāya te namaḥ // BuSto_2.12 //
XXbst-108u:566: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 3:
XXbst-108u:567: Ākāśagarbhanāmāṣṭottaraśatastotram om namo buddhāya ākāśagarbha sattvārtha mahāsattva mahādyute
XXbst-108u:568: mahāratna suratnāgrya vajraratna namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.1 //
XXbst-108u:570: buddharatna viśuddhāṅga ratnaratna namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.2 //
XXbst-108u:574: sarvaratna susarvāgrya ratnakārya namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.4 //
XXbst-108u:576: ratnottama mahākāśa samākāśa namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.5 //
XXbst-108u:578: śuddhasarvārtha śuddhārtha dānacarya namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.6 //
XXbst-108u:580: mahābhiṣeka lokārtha pramodārtha namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.7 //
XXbst-108u:581: dāna pradāna dānāgrya tyāga tyāgāgrya dāyaka /
XXbst-108u:582: sarvasattvārtha tattvārtha mahārthārtha namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.8 //
XXbst-108u:584: tathāgata mahāsattva sarvabuddha namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.9 //
XXbst-108u:586: tathāgata mahāketo mahāhāsa namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.10 //
XXbst-108u:588: lokanātha trilokāgrya lokasūrya namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.11 //
XXbst-108u:590: ratnāloka mahāloka ratnakīrte namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.12 //
XXbst-108u:592: ratnākara sudīptāṅga sarvaratna namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.13 //
XXbst-108u:596: vibhūte sarvasaṃpatte vajragarbhaṃ namo 'stu te // BuSto_3.15 //
XXbst-108u:598: sarvabuddhābhiṣekaṃ tu sa prāpnotyanaghaḥ kṣaṇāt // BuSto_3.16 //
XXbst-108u:600: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 4:
XXbst-108u:619: vināyako vinetā ca jinaputro jinātmajaḥ // BuSto_4.9 //
XXbst-108u:621: dhanado varuṇaścaiva tvaṃ viṣṇustvaṃ maheśvaraḥ // BuSto_4.10 //
XXbst-108u:629: vaidyastvaṃ śalyahartā na naradamyaḥ susārathiḥ // BuSto_4.14 //
XXbst-108u:637: khasamo madhyakalpastvaṃ tvaṃ tejo vāyureva ca // BuSto_4.18 //
XXbst-108u:641: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 5:
XXbst-108u:691: māsamātreṇa caivāsau sukhaṃ bauddhapadaṃ vrajet // BuSto_5.24 //
XXbst-108u:692: viṣaṃ tasya mahāghoraṃ sthāvaraṃ cātha jaṅgamam /
XXbst-108u:693: smaraṇānna padaṃ yāti khāditaṃ pi(pī)tameva vā // BuSto_5.25 //
XXbst-108u:698: iti śrīsamyaksaṃbuddhavailo(ro)canabhāṣitaṃ bhagavatyāryatārādevyā namaskāraikaviṃśatināmāṣṭottaraśatakaṃ buddhabhāṣitaṃ parisamāptam //
XXbst-108u:699: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 6:
XXbst-108u:705: durlaṅdhye duḥkhavahnau vinipatitatanurdurbhagaḥ kāṃdiśīkaḥ kiṃ kiṃ mūḍhaḥ karomītyasakṛdapi kṛtārambhavaiyarthyakhinnaḥ /
XXbst-108u:706: śrutvā bhūyaḥ parebhyaḥ kṣatanayana iva vyomni candrārkalakṣmī-
XXbst-108u:708: sarvasmin sattvamārge nanu tava karuṇā nirviśeṣaṃ pravṛttā tanmadhye tadgraheṇa grahaṇamupagataṃ mādṛśasyāpyavaśyam /
XXbst-108u:709: sāmarthyaṃ ca dvitīyaṃ sakalajagadaghadhvāntatigmāṃśubimbaṃ duḥkhyevāhaṃ tathāpi pratapati dhigaho duṣkṛtaṃ durvidagdham // BuSto_6.3
XXbst-108u:710: dhigdhiṅ māṃ mandabhāgyaṃ divasakararucāpyapraṇūtāndhakāraṃ tṛṣyantaṃ kūlakacche himaśakalaśilāśītale haimavatyāḥ /
XXbst-108u:711: ratnadvīpapratolyā vipulamaṇiguhāgehagarbhe daridraṃ nāthīkṛtyāpyanāthaṃ bhagavati bhavatīṃ sarvalokaikadhātrīm // BuSto_6.4 //
XXbst-108u:712: mātāpi stanyahetorviruvati tanaye khedamāyāti putre krodhaṃ dhatte pitāpi pratidivasamasatprārthanāsu prayuktaḥ /
XXbst-108u:713: tvaṃ tu trailokyavāñchāvipulaphalamahākalpavṛkṣāgravallī sarvebhyo 'bhyarthitārthān visṛjasi na ca te vikriyā jātu kācit //
XXbst-108u:714: yo yaḥ klaiśaughavahnijvalitatanurahaṃ tāriṇī tasya tasye-
XXbst-108u:715: tyātmopajñaṃ pratijñāṃ kuru mayi saphalāṃ duḥkhapātālamagne /
XXbst-108u:716: vardhante yāvadete paruṣaparibhavāḥ prāṇināṃ dukhavegāḥ samyaksaṃbuddhayāne praṇidhidhṛtadhiyāṃ tāvadevānukampā // BuSto_6.6 //
XXbst-108u:717: ityuccairurdhvavāhau nadati nutipadavyājamākrandanādaṃ nārhatyanyo 'pyupekṣāṃ janani janayituṃ kiṃ punaryādṛśī tvam /
XXbst-108u:718: tvattaḥ paśyan pareṣāmabhimatavibhavaprārthanāḥ prāptakāmā dahye sahyena bhūyastaramaratibhuvā santatāntarjvareṇa // BuSto_6.7 //
XXbst-108u:719: pāpī yadyasmi kasmāttvayi mama mahatī barddhate bhaktireṣā śrutyā smṛtyā ca nāmnāpyapaharasi haṭhātpāpamekā tvameva /
XXbst-108u:720: tyaktavyāpārabhārā tadasi mayi kathaṃ kathyatāṃ tathyakathye pathyaṃ glāne mariṣyatyapi vipulakṛpaḥ kiṃ bhiṣag rorudhīti // BuSto_6.8
XXbst-108u:722: yuṣmatpādābjapūjāṃ na kṣaṇamapi labhe yattadarthe viśeṣā-
XXbst-108u:741: pāpātsambhūya bhūyastavaguṇagaṇanātatparastvatparātmā dhatte mattālimālāvalayakuvalasragavibhūṣāṃ vibhūtim // BuSto_6.15 //
XXbst-108u:744: kṣuttṛṭkṣāmopakaṇṭhastyajati sa sapadi vyāpadaṃ tāṃ durantāṃ yo yāyādāryatārācaraṇaśaraṇatāṃ snigdhabandhūjjhito 'pi // BuSto_6.16 //
XXbst-108u:753: yuṣmatpādopasevāgadavaraguṭikābhyāsabhaktiprasaktā jāyante jātarūpapratinidhivapuṣaḥ puṇḍarīkāyatākṣāḥ viśrāntaṃ śrautapātre gurubhirupahṛtaṃ yasya nāmnāyabhaikṣyaṃ vidvadgoṣṭhīṣu yaśca śrutadhanavirahānmūkatāmabhyupetaḥ
XXbst-108u:754: sarvālaṅkārabhūṣāvibhavasamuditaṃ prāpya vāgīśvaratvaṃ so 'pi tvadbhaktiśaktyā harati nṛpasabhe vādisiṃhāsanāni // BuSto_6.20 //
XXbst-108u:755: bhūśayyādhūlidhūmraḥ sphuṭitakaṭitaṭīkarpaṭoddyotitāṅgo yūkāyūṃṣi prapiṃṣan parapuṭapurataḥ karpare tarpaṇārthī /
XXbst-108u:761: vṛtticchede vilakṣaḥ kṣatanivasanayā bhāryayā bhartsyamāno dūrādātmambharitvāt svajanasutasuhṛdbandhubhirvarjyamānaḥ
XXbst-108u:762: tvayyāvedya svaduḥkhaṃ turagakhuramukhotkhātasīmnāṃ gṛhāṇām īṣṭe svāntaḥpurastrīvalayajhaṇajhaṇājātanidrāprabodhaḥ caṅkraddikcakracumbisphuradurukiraṇā lakṣaṇālaṅkṛtā strī-
XXbst-108u:764: bhāsvadbhāsvanmayūkho maṇiramalaguṇaḥ koṣabhṛt svarṇakoṣaḥ senānīrvīrasainyo bhavati bhagavati tvatprasādāṃśaleśāt // BuSto_6.24 //
XXbst-108u:767: kāñcīnādānubandhoddhatataracaraṇodāramañjīratūryās tvannāthān prārthayante smaramadamuditāḥ sādarā devakanyāḥ // BuSto_6.26

XXbst-108u:1227: saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān /
XXbst-108u:1228: teṣu ca pūja kareyu udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ // BuSto_17.25 //
XXbst-108u:1230: bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // BuSto_17.26 //
XXbst-108u:1231: sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃcaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ /
XXbst-108u:1233: ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiyabuddhān /
XXbst-108u:1234: buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ // BuSto_17.28
XXbst-108u:1240: cakranayaṃ parivartayamāno buddhibalena ahaṃ praviśeyam // BuSto_17.31 //
XXbst-108u:1242: ye 'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam //
XXbst-108u:1243: ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena /
XXbst-108u:1244: teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena // BuSto_17.33 //
XXbst-108u:1246: evamaśeṣata sarvadiśāsu otari kṣetraviyūha jinānām // BuSto_17.34 //
XXbst-108u:1247: ye ca anāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim /
XXbst-108u:1248: nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān //
XXbst-108u:1254: mārabalaṃ abalaṃ karamāṇaḥ pūrayi bhadracarībala sarvān // BuSto_17.38 //
XXbst-108u:1260: tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣāt bhadracarīya bibudhyiya bodhim // BuSto_17.41
XXbst-108u:1261: jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ /
XXbst-108u:1262: tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // BuSto_17.42 //
XXbst-108u:1264: yādṛśanāmana bhadravidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena // BuSto_17.43 //
XXbst-108u:1266: sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām // BuSto_17.44
XXbst-108u:1267: no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām /
XXbst-108u:1268: apramāṇu cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām // BuSto_17.45 //
XXbst-108u:1269: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva /
XXbst-108u:1270: karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvata niṣṭha mama praṇidhānam //
XXbst-108u:1271: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā ratnaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām /
XXbst-108u:1272: divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam //
XXbst-108u:1274: bodhivarāmanuprārthayamāno agru viśiṣṭa bhavedimu puṇyam // BuSto_17.48 //
XXbst-108u:1275: varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ /
XXbst-108u:1276: kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracari praṇidhānam //
XXbst-108u:1277: lābha sulabdha sajīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣajanma /
XXbst-108u:1278: yādṛśu so hi samantatabhadraste 'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti // BuSto_17.50
XXbst-108u:1279: pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni /
XXbst-108u:1280: so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam // BuSto_17.51
XXbst-108u:1281: jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirūpetaḥ /
XXbst-108u:1282: tīrthikamāragaṇebhiradhṛṣyaḥ pūjitu bhoti sa sarvatriloke // BuSto_17.52
XXbst-108u:1283: kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya /
XXbst-108u:1284: buddhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam //
XXbst-108u:1285: yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā /
XXbst-108u:1286: buddhavijānati yo 'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha //
XXbst-108u:1287: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva /
XXbst-108u:1288: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // BuSto_17.55 //
XXbst-108u:1290: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī vara bhadracarīye // BuSto_17.56 //
XXbst-108u:1291: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /
XXbst-108u:1292: saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam //
XXbst-108u:1293: tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā /
XXbst-108u:1294: tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kariyāvata loke // BuSto_17.58 //
XXbst-108u:1295: tahi jinamaṃḍali śobhaniramye padmavare rūcire upapannaḥ /
XXbst-108u:1296: vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato amitābhajinasya // BuSto_17.59 //
XXbst-108u:1297: vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabhya ca tasmin nirmita koṭiśatebhiranekaiḥ /
XXbst-108u:1298: sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena // BuSto_17.60
XXbst-108u:1299: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit /
XXbst-108u:1300: ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam //
XXbst-108u:1304: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 18:
XXbst-108u:1307: namastasmai bhagavate 'rhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya jñānaṃ yasya samastavastuviṣayaṃ yasyānavadyaṃ
XXbst-108u:1308: yasmin rāgalavo 'pi naiva na punardveṣo na mohastathā /
XXbst-108u:1310: buddho vā giriśo 'thavā sa bhagavān tasmai namaskurmahe // BuSto_18.1 //
XXbst-108u:1311: devaḥ śambhurna vairī harirapi na ripuḥ kevalī no sapatno nodāsīnaḥ svayambhurna ca punarapare te pare vāsavādyāḥ /
XXbst-108u:1312: śāstā buddho na bandhurjagati na janako naikagotraikajātiḥ kintveṣāṃ vītarāgo bhavati sakalavid yaḥ sudhībhiḥ sa sevyaḥ // BuSto_18.2
XXbst-108u:1315: vītāvidyo vimāyo jagati sa bhagavān vītarāgo munīndraḥ kaḥ sevyo buddhimadbhirvadata vadata me bhrātarasteṣu muktyai //
XXbst-108u:1316: brāhmaṃ vaiṣṇavamaiśvarañca bahudhā labdhvā padaṃ hetutaiḥ
XXbst-108u:1318: kintairdehabhṛtāmapāyabahalairādyantavadbhiḥ padais tasmānnityamanādimadhyanidhanaṃ bauddhaṃ padaṃ prārthyatām // BuSto_18.4
XXbst-108u:1319: cidākāraṃ sūkṣmaṃ vibhuviśadamākārarahitaṃ nirīhaṃ nīrūpaṃ niravadhikṛpābījamajaram /
XXbst-108u:1320: samastajñaṃ sarvopadhirahitamaiśyādamṛtadaṃ jitānaṅgaiḥ sevyaṃ bhavatu mama tadvastu śaraṇam aṇīyo 'ṇoḥ kleśāpratihatamanantaṃ ca mahato
XXbst-108u:1322: dvibāhuṃ nirbāhuṃ dvipadamapadaṃ satrivadānam dvinetraṃ nirnetraṃ saguṇamaguṇaṃ tattu śaraṇam sadānandaṃ tathyaṃ sarasahṛdayaṃ sūktisadanaṃ satāṃ sevyaṃ samyaksamadhigatatattvaṃ samamanaḥ
XXbst-108u:1323: svataḥ siddhaṃ sādhyaṃ sakalaphaladaṃ saumyavadanaṃ sadīyaṃ sarvīyaṃ bhavatu mama tad vastu śaraṇam // BuSto_18.7 //
XXbst-108u:1324: svayambhūtābhijñaṃ bhavabhayaharaṃ bhītirahitaṃ sphuradbhāgyo bhogojjhitamahatavīryaṃ madanajit
XXbst-108u:1325: caturmārgaṃ śuddhaprakṛti ca tathākartṛkamidaṃ mudaṃ lokotkṛṣṭāmatanu tanutāṃ vastu jagatām kvacinnīlaṃ pītaṃ kvacidapi ca raktaṃ kvacidapi kvaciccandracchāyaṃ kvacidapi ca māñjiṣṭharuciram
XXbst-108u:1328: parābhedyaṃ jāmbūnadarūciravarṇaṃ triśaraṇaṃ triyānaṃ triprajñaṃ tribhuvanaśaraṇyaṃ trivacanam
XXbst-108u:1329: kṛpāpātraṃ mandasmitamaruṇasaccīvaradharaṃ kṛtadhyānaṃ siddhāsanaghaṭitapād vastu śaraṇam prasannaṃ phullendīvaranayanayugmaṃ tripiṭakaṃ muhurvyākurvāṇaṃ suranaragaṇebhyaḥ karuṇayā
XXbst-108u:1330: paraṃ śāntaṃ svarṇopalarajataloṣṭreṣu ca samaṃ dṛśāṃ navyātithyaṃ bhavatu mama tad vastu śaraṇam śaraṇamiti sadagraṃ sādhu gacchāmi buddhaṃ śaraṇamiti virāgāgrīyamanvemi dharmam /
XXbst-108u:1331: śaraṇamiti gaṇānāmagriyaṃ yāmi saṃghaṃ śaraṇamiti punastriṃ dvitrivāraṃ vrajāmi // BuSto_18.12
XXbst-108u:1332: punarapi śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi buddhaṃ punarapi lokaguruṃ guruṃ karomi /
XXbst-108u:1333: punarapi kathayāmi naumi vande, tvayi mama gautama naiva tṛptirāste //
XXbst-108u:1335: śaraṇamayamayañca daivatamme gatiraparā mama nāsti nāsti nāsti //
XXbst-108u:1337: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṅghāya ca namo namaḥ // BuSto_18.15 //
XXbst-108u:1338: bho vītarāga bhagavaṃstava pādameva vande munīndra muhurevamimaṃ pravande /
XXbst-108u:1339: bhūyaḥ punaḥ punarimaṃ parataḥ parastāt pārśvadvayorupari dikṣu vidikṣu vande // BuSto_18.16
XXbst-108u:1340: gatamiha bhavatā pathā ca yena sthitamapi yatra ca yatra vā niṣaṇṇam /
XXbst-108u:1341: śayitamapi munīndra yatra yogāt tadapi śataṃ praṇamāmi puṇyatīrtham //
XXbst-108u:1342: samajani bhagavān svayaṃ sma yasmin sakalamabodhi ca yatra dharmacakram /
XXbst-108u:1343: viśadataramadīpi yatra yasminnamṛtamapūri tadapyahaṃ namāmi // BuSto_18.18
XXbst-108u:1345: saddharmacakrasahajaṃ janapārijātaṃ śrīdantadhātumamalaṃ praṇamāmi bhaktyā // BuSto_18.19
XXbst-108u:1349: yaṃ prāpya māravijayānupadaṃ prapede sarvajñatāṃ sa bhagavān tamahaṃ namāmi // BuSto_18.21
XXbst-108u:1350: mūrddhan buddhaṃ nama tvaṃ śravaṇa śṛṇu sadā dharmamadvaidhavādi proktaṃ sarvatra rūpaṃ nayana nirupamaṃ paśya jighrāṅaghripadmam /
XXbst-108u:1351: ghrāṇa tvaṃ cārkabandhoḥ stuhi sakhi rasane śrīghanaṃ pūjayethāḥ siddhaṃ pāṇe vrajāṅghre jinasadanamadasmadguṇaṃ citta cintya //
XXbst-108u:1354: eṣo 'haṃ tatparaḥ syāmparamayanamito nāsti me satyametat syāmasyāhantu śiṣyastridaśanutamidaṃ koṭikṛtvo namāmi // BuSto_18.23 //
XXbst-108u:1355: nāhaṃ lābhārcanārthī na ca bhayacakito nāpi satkīrtikāmo na tvaṃ dharmāṃśuvaṃśaprabhava iti mune nāpi vidyāśayā te /
XXbst-108u:1356: pāramparyānnaca tvāṃ śaraṇamupagataḥ kintu te sārvajanyaṃ samyagjñānaṃ samīkṣya tvayi bhavajaladhiṃ santarītuṃ pravṛttaḥ //
XXbst-108u:1359: bhūpā vā yadi daṇḍayanti vibudhā nindanti vā bāndhavā muñcanti kṣaṇamapyahaṃ jina pitarjīvāmi na tvāṃ vinā // BuSto_18.25 //
XXbst-108u:1360: svarge vā vasatirmamāstu niraye tiryakṣu kiṃ vāsure pretānāṃ nagare 'thavā narapure kvāpyanyataḥ karmaṇā /
XXbst-108u:1361: bho sarvajña tatastatastava guṇān karṇāmṛtasyandino niṣpāpānavalambatāṃ mama mano nānyā sukhaprārthanā tavaivāhaṃ dāso guṇapaṇagṛhīto 'smi bhavatā tavaivāhaṃ śiṣyaḥ svavacanavinīto 'smi bhavatā
XXbst-108u:1362: tavaivāhaṃ putraḥ smṛtikṛtasukhastadgatigato guro buddhasvāmin mama janaka māṃ pāhi bhavataḥ pitā mātā bhrātā tvamasi bhaginī tvaṃ ca vipadi sthiraṃ mitraṃ bandhuḥ prabhuramṛtadīkṣāgurutamaḥ
XXbst-108u:1363: tvamaiśvaryyaṃ bhogo tvamasi dhanadhānyaṃ ca mahimā yaśo vidyā prāṇastvamasi mama sarvajña sakalam // BuSto_18.28 //
XXbst-108u:1365: adhigatāmṛta buddha mano 'mbujaṃ mama tavānagha gandhakuṭīyatām //
XXbst-108u:1367: tvamekosi māṃ trātumīśo dayābdhe prabho 'taḥ prasīda prasīda prasīda //
XXbst-108u:1368: prasīdeśa deveśa lokeśa jiṣṇo jagadvandya madvandya sadvandya buddha /
XXbst-108u:1369: aghore bhavāre smarāre tamore tavaivāsmi bhakto vapurvāṅmanobhiḥ //
XXbst-108u:1370: sa tava kulasutaḥ sa eva bhaktaḥ sa bhavati śāsanadhūrvahaḥ sa śiṣyaḥ /
XXbst-108u:1371: sa ca śaraṇagataḥ sa eva dāsaḥ kathamapi yo na vilaṅghayet tavājñām //
XXbst-108u:1372: jagadupakṛtireva buddha! pūjā tadapakṛtistava lokanātha! pīḍā /
XXbst-108u:1373: jina jagadapakṛt kathaṃ na lajje gaditumahaṃ tava pādapadmabhaktaḥ //
XXbst-108u:1375: tamahitamapakartturasya lokaṃ kva mama kṛpā muditā kva vā ca maitrī //
XXbst-108u:1377: api ca viṣayiṇo na mokṣasiddhiḥ kimu karavāṇi munīndra dehi dāsyam //
XXbst-108u:1381: tava kathamanuyāmi dharmanāvaṃ jina mama dehi kṛpākarāvalambam //
XXbst-108u:1383: dhara gurutaratṛṣṇayā patantaṃ jina mama dehi kṛpākarāvalambam //
XXbst-108u:1384: jagati tava kṛpā hi nirviśeṣā prapavatayā jina māṃ ca doṣaduṣṭam /
XXbst-108u:1385: alamahamiaha no sukhī bhavendurna samakaraścaratīva sādhvasādhve(dhvoḥ) //
XXbst-108u:1388: akaravamuruduṣkṛtaṃ purā yad mama vapuṣā manasā ca cetasā ca /
XXbst-108u:1389: anukalamakhilaṃ pralīyatāṃ tat tava caraṇasmaraṇena sarvavedin //
XXbst-108u:1390: sugata tava puraḥ puraḥ pṛthivyāṃ madhuramate patito 'smi daṇḍanatyā /
XXbst-108u:1391: akuśalamakhilaṃ tavānubhāvāt prapatatu notpatatāt punaḥ sahaiva //
XXbst-108u:1392: tava caraṇasarojameva vande tava padapaṅkajameva pūjayāmi /
XXbst-108u:1393: tava padayugameva bhāvaye 'haṃ tava padameva sadaiva daivataṃ me //
XXbst-108u:1394: kamapi na kathayāmi nārcayāmi kamapi na naumi na cintayāmi nehe /
XXbst-108u:1395: kamapi na śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hitvā tava caraṇaṃ pitarasmi kiṅkaraste //
XXbst-108u:1396: sadasi sadasi vāci siddhaṃ pathi pathi sadmani sadmanīha buddham /
XXbst-108u:1397: bhuvi bhuvi mama vāri vāri cetaḥ kalayatu nityamimaṃ hi lokanātham //
XXbst-108u:1399: svapimi niśi nidhāya yaddhṛdi tvāṃ na mama samaṃ virahastvayā ta eva //
XXbst-108u:1400: mama tadiha dinaṃ hi durdinaṃ syād aśitaghanasthagitaṃ na durdinaṃ me /
XXbst-108u:1402: amṛtada ṣaḍabhijña dharmarāja tribhuvanavandya munīndra gotameti /
XXbst-108u:1404: daśabala jina siddha vajrabuddhe sugata tathāgata buddha śākyasiṃha /
XXbst-108u:1405: iti nigadati yaḥ kvacit kadācit tamabhinamāmyapi dāsavaṃśajātam //
XXbst-108u:1407: kavivara vadatāṃvareśa śuddhodanasuta śākyamune mune prasīda //
XXbst-108u:1408: amṛtamapi nipīya nirjarendra punarapi te 'pi śunīstanaṃ dhayanti /
XXbst-108u:1409: sakṛdapi tava vāksudhārasajño na viśati jātu sa mātureva garbham //
XXbst-108u:1411: kuru mama karuṇaṃ diśo na jāne guru tadavekṣya ca tiryagādiduḥkham //
XXbst-108u:1413: agatikamativepate mano me jina kimahaṃ karavai prabho prasīda //
XXbst-108u:1415: aviratamata eva śāntibīje tvayi valate ramate mamātra cetaḥ // BuSto_18.54
XXbst-108u:1416: savipadi ramate na me mano 'taḥ suranaraśarmaṇi pūrvapūrvabhukte /
XXbst-108u:1417: anudinamanubhūya śarkarāyāmapi viratiṃ kurute hi dṛṣṭadoṣaḥ // BuSto_18.55
XXbst-108u:1419: kathamahamapahāya buddharatnaṃ jagati dhanī guṇavāṃśca paṇḍitaśca //
XXbst-108u:1420: sa bhavati matimān sa nākulīnaḥ sa ca guṇavān sa ca kīrtimān sa śūraḥ /
XXbst-108u:1421: sa jagati mahitaḥ sukhī sa eva tvayi jina yasya suniścalāsti bhaktiḥ //
XXbst-108u:1422: api sakalamadhītamatra tena śrutamapi sarvamanuṣṭhitaṃ ca tena /
XXbst-108u:1423: api jitamajitena tena viśvaṃ tvayi jina yasya suniścalāsti bhaktiḥ //
XXbst-108u:1424: tyajati nijaparamparādareṇetarasamayasya jano na dṛṣṭa dṛṣṭim /
XXbst-108u:1425: asuharamapi gauraveṇa māturna khalu śiśurviṣamodakaṃ tu muñcet //
XXbst-108u:1426: kavivaramahamasmi paṇḍitaste jina na jahāmi kathannu kurgṛhītam /
XXbst-108u:1427: nudati hi tamasantatiṃ pravṛttāṃ mihiramarīcisahāyinī sudṛṣṭiḥ //
XXbst-108u:1428: sugatapadaparāṅmukhasya puṃsaḥ kimu tapasā yaśasā ca kiṃ kimanyaiḥ /
XXbst-108u:1429: sugatapadaparāṅnukhasya puṃsaḥ kimu tapasā yaśasā ca kiṃ kimanyaiḥ //
XXbst-108u:1430: sugatapadi na bhaktirasti yeṣāmajananireva mahītale 'stu teṣām /
XXbst-108u:1431: kathitamiha kṛtāgasāṃ narāṇāṃ nirayagatirniyataṃ na cānyato yat //
XXbst-108u:1433: jina bhavadanupāsakaṃ nṛpāsaṃ tyajatu mano mala nīcavattu jātyā //
XXbst-108u:1435: tava padadṛḍhabhaktirantyajo 'pi pratibhavamastu narottamaḥ sakhā me //
XXbst-108u:1438: sa bhavati surasundarīsakho 'nyaiḥ kṛtamabhinandati vārcanaṃ ca bhaktyā /
XXbst-108u:1442: maṇikanakaśilādinirmitāṃ yaḥ praṇamati te pratimāṃ tayośca tulyam /
XXbst-108u:1443: phalamiha manasaśca samprasādādanuparataṃ jina yo 'grato namet tvām //
XXbst-108u:1444: sakṛdapi tava pādapadmapūjā vanakusumairapi yaḥ karoti dhīmān /
XXbst-108u:1448: tava guṇakathane tu yaḥ prasannastamanuviśanti mune guṇāstvadīyāḥ /
XXbst-108u:1450: sakṛdapi samadāyi deva kiñcid bhavaratimutsṛjatā janena tubhyam /
XXbst-108u:1451: sugata tadakhilān lunāti dhārā vadasiriva drumamāśravādidoṣān //
XXbst-108u:1452: kṛtamiha sukṛtaṃ mṛṣādṛśā yajjanayati tat kila tasya durvipākam /
XXbst-108u:1454: tava padanaline nipatya bhūyo nipatati naiva caturṣvapāyakeṣu /
XXbst-108u:1455: nahi kuśalakaro naraḥ kadāpi kvacidapi durgatimeti nātha kaścit //
XXbst-108u:1456: iti bhavadupadeśato viditvā tava padapaṅkajapūjane rato 'smi /
XXbst-108u:1457: dṛḍhayatu bhagavān yuge yuge me kumatimudasya bhave bhave 'ryabhaktim //
XXbst-108u:1458: sthiramapi bhagavan kṣaṇaṃ tavoktau karacaraṇāni dṛgādi vairivargaḥ /
XXbst-108u:1459: vyathayati hṛdayaṃ balādvicālya tvamidamanāthamanīśa pāhi pāhi //
XXbst-108u:1460: yadi nayanamayaṃ vaśe vidhātuṃ yatati tadā dravati śravo yadā tat /
XXbst-108u:1463: kabhamapi bhajate krameṇa dhairyaṃ ciaramidamabhyasanena saṃviraktyā //
XXbst-108u:1464: viśadamapi manaḥ svabhāvato me cirakṛtakilviṣakālimāhṛtaṃ syāt /
XXbst-108u:1468: sati sakalaguro mune prasanne kimiha durāpamamutra kiṃ durāpam /
XXbst-108u:1472: na bhavati jina yāvadeṣa jīrṇo viṣayapiśācaniṣevaṇena tāvat /
XXbst-108u:1473: jhaṭiti sukṛtakarmaṇi prayojya svava śaraṇāgatavatsalāgataṃ mām //
XXbst-108u:1475: sthagayati mamatā ca māmahantā tadapi hi mohavijṛmbhitaṃ garīyaḥ //
XXbst-108u:1476: ajani ca nijakāraṇena sarvaṃ nirasati jīryati naśyati svahetoḥ /
XXbst-108u:1477: ahamapi hi tathaiva dhātupuñjaḥ kathamahamasya kathaṃ mune mamedam //
XXbst-108u:1478: ātmabuddhiriha yasya jāyate sā ca tasya janayedahaṅkṛtim /
XXbst-108u:1479: sā tanoti sutarāṃ bhavaspṛhāṃ saiva mohajananī muhurmuhuḥ // BuSto_18.86
XXbst-108u:1480: tena karma kurute śubhāśubhaṃ taddhi duḥkhajanakaṃ bhavatraye /
XXbst-108u:1481: duḥkhamūlamata eva sātmadhīḥ tāṃ lunīhi jina me vaco 'sinā // BuSto_18.87
XXbst-108u:1484: snāne karmaṇi bhojane vitaraṇe ghrāṇe tathākarṇane dhyānasparśanadarśanādiṣu tathā sambhāṣaṇādāvapi
XXbst-108u:1485: prātaḥ sāyamatho divā ca niśi ca tvatpādapadme vibho cittaṃ me ramatāṃ munīndra satataṃ yūnāṃ yuvatyāmiva // BuSto_18.89 //
XXbst-108u:1486: matsvāmin madabhīṣṭakalpaviṭapin maddevate madguro manmātarmadupāsya matpriyasakhe matsadgate matpitaḥ /
XXbst-108u:1487: madvidye madaśeṣaduḥkhaśamakṛd madbhāvane mannidhe manmukte madudārabhāgya madaso madbuddha māṃ pālaya // BuSto_18.90 //
XXbst-108u:1490: śeṣaḥ śeṣānubhāvastava sugata nutau khaṇḍitākhaṇḍaloktiḥ ko 'haṃ mūḍho varākastridaśanarapate kīrttane te guṇānām // BuSto_18.91 //
XXbst-108u:1492: kalāmapi na ṣoḍaśīṃ bhajati tasya puṇyātmanaś caturmukhamukho gaṇo diviṣadāṃ nṛṇāṃ kā kathā mahendranavacāpavat kanakaparvate sarvataḥ sadā tava manoharaṃ sphurati suprabhāmaṇḍalam /
XXbst-108u:1493: dṛśo bhavati gocaraṃ tadiha yasya tasya tvarān tamastatimanuttamāṃ harati dūramantarbahiḥ rūpaṃ locanalobhanaṃ śravaṇayorānandasandohadā vāṇī viśvavimohakṛt tava kṛpāveśo 'tiśāntastava
XXbst-108u:1494: pāṇḍityaṃ prathitaṃ jagatsu bhagavan sarvajñanāmnaiva te sāmrājyasya ca yauvane nirasanaṃ vairāgyasīmā sphuṭam // BuSto_18.94 //
XXbst-108u:1495: śauryaṃ tvadviṣameṣu darpadalanādaṅgīkṛtaṃ daivataiḥ yadvāṇaiḥ sa surāsuraḥ pravijito loko 'yamośatkaram /
XXbst-108u:1496: vīryaṃ te prakaṭīcakāra nitarāṃ nirvāṇasākṣātkṛtiḥ kiṃ brūmo balavaibhavaṃ bhagavatastatte jagaddurvaham // BuSto_18.95 //
XXbst-108u:1497: yatra cchāgaturaṅgamāraṇavidhirvede 'pi taṃ nindasi premṇā prāṇabhṛtāmataḥ sakaruṇastvatto mahānnāparaḥ /
XXbst-108u:1498: evaṃ te guṇasampado na viṣayā buddherasūyātmanāṃ te mūḍhāḥ pralapanti hanta sugato madvedanindītyayam nirmajjatsurasundarīkucacalannirmandamandākinī-
XXbst-108u:1500: yannāliṅgati mandabhāgyamadhunā bhūyānna tenāpi me saṅgaḥ saṅgagadādivaidya bhagavanneṣāpi me prārthanā // BuSto_18.97 //
XXbst-108u:1501: ye tvāṃ gacchanti buddhaṃ śaraṇamiti na te durgatiṃ yānti santas tyaktvā kāyānmanuṣyānniratiśayasukhān te labhante 'tha divyān /
XXbst-108u:1502: duḥsvapno durnimittaṃ durahidurahitā durgrahā duṣṭasattvā duḥkhaṃ durvyādhayo 'pi kvacidiha kuśalān nopasarpanti caivam //
XXbst-108u:1503: chatraṃ brahmā vyadhātte maṇimayamamalaṃ cāmaraṃ cakrapāṇi-
XXbst-108u:1505: anye dīpodakumbhadhvajakusumalasatpāṇayo bhaktinamrās tasthurvyākhyāya dharmaṃ bhuvamavaruhataḥ svargataste munīndra //
XXbst-108u:1506: mātevāsīt parastrī bhavati paradhane na spṛhā yasya puṃso mithyāvādī na yaḥ syānna pibati madirāṃ prāṇino yo na hanyāt /
XXbst-108u:1507: maryādābhaṅgabhīruḥ sakaruṇahṛdayastyaktasarvābhimāno dharmātmā te sa eva prabhavati bhagavan pādapūjāṃ vidhātum // BuSto_18.100
XXbst-108u:1508: sarvaprāṇātipātāt paradhanaharaṇāt saṅgamādaṅganāyā mithyāvādācca madyādbhavati jagati yo 'kālabhutkternivṛttaḥ /
XXbst-108u:1509: saṅgītasraksugandhābharaṇavilasitāduccaśayyāsanād apyāsīddhīmān sa eva tridaśanaraguro tvatsuto nātra śaṅkā // BuSto_18.101
XXbst-108u:1510: śrotāpattyādimārgāḥ sadavayavayutā ghnanti rāgādidoṣān doṣāste chinnamūlā hatabhavagatayastatphalairyānti śāntim /
XXbst-108u:1511: mārgāṇāṃ kleśahāniḥ sadamṛtamajaraṃ kāraṇaṃ syānnavānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hetureṣāṃ tava jina vacanaṃ tasya hetustvameva // BuSto_18.102
XXbst-108u:1513: catvāro labdhamārgāstadanuguṇaphalāste 'pi catvāra evaṃ tvataścāṣṭāryasaṅghaḥ pṛthagiti na punaścintayāmo munīndra // BuSto_18.103
XXbst-108u:1516: vadasi jina viditvānantayā jñānagatyā tava ca guṇamanantaṃ vedasī buddha caivam // BuSto_18.104
XXbst-108u:1517: bhagavati bhavatīti dhvaṃsakāriṇyamoghe bhavatu bhavatu bhaktirjanmajanmāntare 'pi /
XXbst-108u:1520: tribhuvanamahanīyaṃ tvāmabhiṣṭutya buddhaṃ viśadataramadabhraṃ puṇyamatrārjitaṃ yat /
XXbst-108u:1521: jagati sakalasattvāstena sambuddhabodhiṃ vidhutavividhapāpā bhāvanābhirvrajantu // BuSto_18.106
XXbst-108u:1522: bhāsvadbhānukulāmbujanmamihire rājādhirājeśvare śrīlaṅkādhipatau parākramabhuje nītyā mahīṃ śāsati /
XXbst-108u:1523: sadgauḍaḥ kavibhāratikṣitisuraḥ śrīrāmacandraḥ sudhīḥ śrītṛṇāmakarot sa bhaktiśatakaṃ dharmārthamokṣapradam śrīśākyamunerbhagavataḥ sarvajñasya paramopāsakena gauḍadeśīya-
XXbst-108u:1524: śrībauddhāgamacakravarttinā bhūsureṇācāryeṇa mahāpaṇḍitena viracitaṃ bhaktiśatakaṃ samāptam
XXbst-108u:1527: buddho me jayatāṃ jinaḥ sa bhagavān taddeśanā nirmalā stheyāt sattvahitāya bhātu bhaṇitā saṅghastadādhārakaḥ
XXbst-108u:1528: laṅkeśapramukhāściaraṃ vasumatīṃ rakṣantu nityaṃ nṛpā varṣantu stanayitnavaśca samaye maitrīṃ labhantāṃ prajāḥ // BuSto_18.2 //
XXbst-108u:1533: namo buddhāya gurave namo dharmāya śāsine /
XXbst-108u:1534: namaḥ saṅghāya mahate tribhyo 'pi satataṃ namaḥ // BuSto_18.4 //
XXbst-108u:1536: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 19:
XXbst-108u:1537: Buddhabhaṭṭārakastotram om namo buddhāya saṃbuddhaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sarvajñaṃ karuṇātmakam /
XXbst-108u:1540: śrīmantaṃ śrīkaraṃ śāntaṃ śāntamūrtiṃ namāmyaham // BuSto_19.2 //
XXbst-108u:1550: sugataṃ sugatiṃ saumyaṃ śubhrakīrtiṃ namāmyaham // BuSto_19.7 //
XXbst-108u:1566: uttamaṃ satpadaṃ brahma puṇyakṣetraṃ namāmyaham // BuSto_19.15 //
XXbst-108u:1568: prāpnuvanti padaṃ mokṣaṃ divyaṃ tvatha sanātanam // BuSto_19.16 //
XXbst-108u:1572: vyādhayo 'pi na bādhyante pātakaṃ ca vinaśyati // BuSto_19.18 //
XXbst-108u:1574: medhāvī ca tathā vāgmī jāyate janmajanmani // BuSto_19.19 //
XXbst-108u:1576: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 20:
XXbst-108u:1579: yaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhimūle ravigamanapathe māragānnṛtyagītān gaṃgau gaṃgau gagaṃgau ghaghanaghanamṛdudvandvamantrairajasraiḥ
XXbst-108u:1580: yaḥ strībhirdivyarūpairuparatarabhituṃ dūdubhirdurbhidūrbhiḥ kṣobhaṃ naivābhiyātaḥ suranaranamitaḥ pātu vaḥ śākyasiṃhaḥ // BuSto_20.1
XXbst-108u:1582: ryaḥ sphītāḍambarāṇāṃ taṭiti taṭataṭā tātaṭīti pralāpaiḥ /
XXbst-108u:1583: kutkud budbud kukūcit kukuhakuhakuhaiḥ kiṅkarāṇāṃ ca vāgbhi-
XXbst-108u:1584: rno trasyaḥ so 'stu saumyaḥ śrutasakalamalaḥ śāntaye vo munīndraḥ //
XXbst-108u:1587: rbhrāntiṃ ceto na citraṃ smarabalajayino yasya tasmai namo 'stu //
XXbst-108u:1588: urvīṃ sañcālayantaḥ kharaśaranikaraiśchādayantoḥntarīkṣaṃ jvālābhiḥ krodhaṃvahnerjvalitadaśadiśaḥ kṣobhayanto 'mburāśim /
XXbst-108u:1589: helotkhātāsicakrakrakacapaṭuravārāviṇo māravīrāḥ maitrīśastreṇa yena prasabhamabhijitāḥ pātu vaḥ so munīndraḥ // BuSto_20.4
XXbst-108u:1591: kandarpoddāmavahnisphuradasikiraṇodbhāsitāśeṣaviśvaṃ puṣpeṣoḥ sainyamuccairjhaṭiti vighaṭitaṃ yena buddhaḥ sa vo 'vyāt //
XXbst-108u:1592: divyairākaṇaṃpūraiḥ kamaladalanibhaiḥ pakṣmalairlolatārair bhāvasnigdhairvidagdhaiḥ pracalitalalitaiḥ sasmitairbhrūvilāsaiḥ /
XXbst-108u:1593: netrairmārāṅganānāṃ parigatavalayairlohitāntairaśāntair nākṛṣṭaḥ sarvathā yastamahamṛṣivaraṃ vāntadoṣaṃ namāmi // BuSto_20.6 //
XXbst-108u:1594: nodbhrāntaṃ yasya cittaṃ sphuṭavikaṭasaṭāntotkaṭairlolajihvair māraiḥ śūlāgrahastairgajaturagamukhaiḥ siṃhaśārdūlavaktraiḥ /
XXbst-108u:1595: pradyumnaḥ kāmadevastṛṇavadagaṇito yena saṃrambhabhīruḥ saṃbuddhaḥ pātu yuṣmān vyapagatakaluṣo lokanātho munīndraḥ // BuSto_20.7
XXbst-108u:1597: yenāsau puṣpaketustṛṇavadagaṇitaḥ sarvavid vītarāgaḥ sa śrīmān buddhavīraḥ kaluṣabhayaharaḥ pātu vo vītarāgaḥ // BuSto_20.8 //
XXbst-108u:1599: na kṣubdhaṃ yasya cittaṃ girisamamacalaṃ gāḍhaparyaṅkabandhaṃ taṃ vande vandanīyaṃ tribhavabhayaharaṃ buddhavīraṃ pravīram // BuSto_20.9
XXbst-108u:1600: uccairaṭṭāṭṭahāsaiḥ prakaṭapaṭubhaṭābaddhaghaṇṭai raṇadbhiḥ sāṭopāsphoṭaṭaṅkasphuṭajaṭilajaṭaiḥ kiṅkaraiḥ koṭarākṣaiḥ /
XXbst-108u:1601: bhagnaṃ kartu na śaktāḥ paṭupaṭahapaṭasphālanairyasya bodhau dṛptānāṃ gṛdhrakūṭe paṭupaṭahapaṭuḥ so 'stu vo buddhavīraḥ // BuSto_20.10
XXbst-108u:1602: kokaṇḍaṃ rāmakaṇḍaṃ pratibhayakuharaṃ darpadarpaṃ raṇāṇḍaṃ ḍimbaṃ ḍimbaṃ ḍaḍimbaṃ ḍuha ḍuhaka ḍuhaṃ tṛṃkhalastṛṃkhalastṛm /
XXbst-108u:1603: jhimbaṃ jhimbaṃ jhajhimbaṃ khamu khamu khamukhaṃ maṃkhu maṃkhuḥ khumaṃkhur ebhirdhvānairna bhītaḥ suravaranamitaḥ pātu vaḥ śākyasiṃhaḥ // BuSto_20.11
XXbst-108u:1605: samyaksaṃbodhilakṣmīḥ śaśinamiva śaratkaumudī saṃprapede tasyeyaṃ dharmadūtī dhvanati bhagavato dharmarājasya gaṇḍī // BuSto_20.12
XXbst-108u:1606: nighnannaprāptadṛṣṭiḥ kṣaṇamapi ca cirādantako yad durantaṃ tasminnikṣiptacittāḥ kuruta sucariteṣvādaraṃ sarvakāle /
XXbst-108u:1607: itthaṃ ratnatrayājñāmiva vadati muhuḥ prāṇināṃ yasya saiṣām eṣā śabdāyamānā prathitamukharadiṅmaṇḍalā dharmagaṇḍī // BuSto_20.13 //
XXbst-108u:1608: mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalamivoḍugaṇaṃ vijitya bhātīha tīrthikajanaṃ jinaśāsanaṃ ca /
XXbst-108u:1609: raṃramyate dharaṇimaṇḍalamaṇḍanasya gaṇḍī yamasya jayaḍiṇḍimavatpracaṇḍā // BuSto_20.14
XXbst-108u:1610: yasyātyantaṃ dṛḍhatvaṃ jami jami ḍuḍubhaṃ rañjitenālināliṃ ḍimbaṃ ḍimbaṃ ḍiḍimbaṃ ḍubhaḍubhaḍuḍubhaṃ nāḍivannāḍibhaṇḍam /
XXbst-108u:1611: ruṇḍaṃ ruṇḍaṃ ruruṇḍaṃ yaralava khakhumaṃ maṃkhumaṃkhuḥ khumaṃkhuḥ paśya tvaṃ jīvaloke daśabalabalinaḥ pīḍyate mārasainyam // BuSto_20.15 //
XXbst-108u:1612: bhūkampotkampajātā pracalitavasudhā kampate merurāja uttrastā devasaṃghā grahagaṇasahitā nāgarājāḥ samastāḥ /
XXbst-108u:1613: śrutvā gaṇḍīṃ pracaṇḍāṃ vividhabhayakarīṃ trāsanīṃ tairthikānāṃ bauddhānāṃ śāntihetoḥ pratiraṇati mahīṃ rāvayantīva sadyaḥ // BuSto_20.16
XXbst-108u:1614: eṣā vihāraśikhare pravirauti gaṇḍī meghasvanena kurute ca manojñaghoṣān /
XXbst-108u:1615: māteva vatsalatayā subahirgatāṃśca putrān samāhvayati bhojanakālagaṇḍī //
XXbst-108u:1617: nādaṃ karoti suradundubhitulyaghoṣā gaṇḍī samastaduritāni nivārayantī //
XXbst-108u:1618: eṣā hi gaṇḍī raṇate narāṇāṃ saṃbodhinī devanarāsurāṇām /
XXbst-108u:1619: bhadrāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ sugatasya gaṇḍīmāpūritāṃ bhikṣugaṇaiḥ samagraiḥ //
XXbst-108u:1620: nāgaiḥ saṃvartakālakṣubhitajaladharākāravad vyomni kīrṇaiḥ kvāsmin vighvaṃsaśaṅkā bhayacakitajanaistatpratīkārahetoḥ
XXbst-108u:1621: kurvantyadyāpi yasyā dhvanimupaśamitāśeṣatīrthyāvalepaṃ sā gaṇḍī pātu yuṣmān sakalamunivaraiḥ sthāpitā dharmavṛddhyai //
XXbst-108u:1624: puṇye tatparamānasā bhavata bhoḥ svargāpavargaprade pāpaṃ durgatidāyakaṃ kuruta mā lokāścalaṃ jīvitam /
XXbst-108u:1625: itthaṃ madhyavilīnabhṛṅgavirutaṃ yatnānnivāryaṃ mayā mārāreścaraṇābjayorvinihitaḥ puṣpāñjaliḥ pātu vaḥ // BuSto_20.22 //
XXbst-108u:1626: muñjadbhiḥ kusumāni tūryaraṇitairāpūrayadbhirdiśo jojokārapuraḥsaraiḥ suragaṇaiḥ śakrādibhiḥ sādaraiḥ /
XXbst-108u:1627: svargād yasya bhuvaṃ kilāvatarato dattānuyātrā ciraṃ tasyāvyāt karuṇānidherbhagavato gaṇḍī pracaṇḍā jagat // BuSto_20.23 //
XXbst-108u:1628: gatvā sapta padāni māturudarānniṣkrāntamātraḥ svayaṃ saṃsāraśravasaṃ mameti vacanaṃ provāca yo 'nanyadhīḥ /
XXbst-108u:1629: yasminnātmabhuve punastribhuvanaṃ bhrājiṣṇvabhivyāhṛtaṃ kuryādvaḥ sugatasya tasya jayino gaṇḍī tamaḥkhaṇḍinī // BuSto_20.24 //
XXbst-108u:1630: jitvā mārabalaṃ mahābhayakaraṃ kṛtvā ca doṣakṣayaṃ sarvajñaṃ padamāpa yat suruciraṃ tatraiva rātrau bahiḥ /
XXbst-108u:1631: tasyāśeṣaguṇākarasya sudhiyo buddhasya śuddhātmano gaṇḍī khaṇḍitacaṇḍakilviṣaharā bhūyād vibhūtyai nṛṇām // BuSto_20.25 //
XXbst-108u:1632: brahmā jihma ivābhavat suragururgarvaṃ jahau sarvathā śarvaḥ kharvamatirbabhūva bhagavān viṣṇuśca tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ /
XXbst-108u:1633: itthaṃ yadguṇakīrtaneṣu vibudhā yātā hriyā mūkatāṃ gaṇḍī tasya muneriyaṃ jayati vaḥ pāyādapāyājjagat brahmādityaśaśāṅkaśaṅkaraśatākṣopendrayakṣādayo gandharvoragakinnarāsurasamīrapretapīḍāmbarāḥ
XXbst-108u:1634: ye tiṣṭhantyamarā narā kṣititale pātālalokeṣu ca śrotuṃ dharmamimaṃ tathāgataguroḥ sarve samāyāntu te // BuSto_20.27 //
XXbst-108u:1635: yasyā janmani dīnahīnamatayaḥ prāpuḥ śucaṃ tīrthikāḥ harṣotkarṣaviśeṣavardhitadhiyo bauddhā dhṛtiṃ lebhire /
XXbst-108u:1636: yāmāsādya guṇāḥ prayānti vitatiṃ doṣā vrajanti kṣayaṃ sā gaṇḍī kalikālakalmaṣaharā bhūyād bhavadbhūtaye // BuSto_20.28 //
XXbst-108u:1637: yāṃ natvā vidhivad viśuddhamatayo gacchanti tuṅgāṃ gatiṃ yasyāḥ kṣiprataraṃ prayānti vivaśāḥ sarve vipakṣāḥ kṣayam /
XXbst-108u:1638: dhvastavyastasamastamohapaṭalā sā dharmagaṇḍī muneḥ saṃbhūyād bhavabhāvisādhvasabhide yuṣmākamāyuṣmatām śrutvā yāṃ patitā mahītalamalaṃ brahmādayaḥ svarbhuvaḥ kampante dharaṇīdharāḥ kṣitirapi kṣipraṃ gatā kṣmātalam /

XXbst-108u:2507: kathaṃ nāma na tatspaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamāgatāḥ // BuSto_38.4 //
XXbst-108u:2509: rūpaṃ tvayaivaṃ bruvatā rūpagrāho nivāritaḥ // BuSto_38.5 //
XXbst-108u:2511: tacca vedyaṃ svabhāvena nāstītyabhimataṃ tava // BuSto_38.6 //
XXbst-108u:2516: na kartā 'sti na bhoktā 'sti puṇyāpuṇyaṃ pratītyajam /
XXbst-108u:2517: yatpratītya na tajjātaṃ proktaṃ vācaspate tvayā // BuSto_38.9 //
XXbst-108u:2518: ajñāpyamānaṃ na jñeyaṃ vijñānaṃ tadvinā na ca /
XXbst-108u:2519: tasmāt svabhāvato na sto jñānajñeye tvamūcivān // BuSto_38.10 //
XXbst-108u:2523: śāntaṃ jagadidaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavatā jñānacakṣuṣā // BuSto_38.12 //
XXbst-108u:2524: na sannutpadyate bhāvo nāpyasan sadasanna ca /
XXbst-108u:2525: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ jāyate katham // BuSto_38.13 //
XXbst-108u:2531: pṛthaktvena hi bhāvasya vināśa upapadyate // BuSto_38.16 //
XXbst-108u:2533: na vā 'vinaṣṭāt svapnena tulyotpattirmatā tava // BuSto_38.17 //
XXbst-108u:2539: svapnavat saṃsṛtiḥ proktā tvayā tattvavidāṃvara // BuSto_38.20 //
XXbst-108u:2542: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
XXbst-108u:2549: yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tathatāṃ buddhavānasi // BuSto_38.25 //
XXbst-108u:2553: atastvayā mahāyāne tat sākalyena darśitam // BuSto_38.27 //
XXbst-108u:2554: yadavāptaṃ mayā puṇyaṃ stutvā tvāṃ stutibhājanam /
XXbst-108u:2557: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 39:
XXbst-108u:2559: bhāsvanmāṇikyabhāso mukuṭabhṛti namannākanāthottamāṅge bhaktiprahve sarojāsanaśirasi hasanmālatīmālikābhaḥ
XXbst-108u:2560: maulau mīlanmṛgāṅgāmakṛśakapiśatāṃ śāmbhave śātayantyo loke lokeśapādāmalanakhaśaśabhṛtkāntayaḥ santu śāntyai // BuSto_39.1 //
XXbst-108u:2561: nirdhūtā dhūrjaṭīndorna khalu paṭu jaṭāpiṅgamāsaṅgaśāraiḥ sārairārānmayūkhairna ca harimukuṭāmandamāṇikyabhābhiḥ
XXbst-108u:2562: kālimno nāpi līnā vibudhagaṇalalatkuntalālīnalīnāl lokeśvaryo 'nivāryāścaraṇanakharucaḥ santu vo dhvāntaśāntyai // BuSto_39.2
XXbst-108u:2564: na kṣiptālaṅghanairapyupaśamitatamodurgrahodbhūtabhītir lokeśāṅghryorapūrvā nakhaśiśirarūcāṃ candrikā vaḥ punātu // BuSto_39.3 //
XXbst-108u:2566: vahniskandheṣvabandhyā narakabhuvi sudhāvārivistāradhārāḥ saṃsārīṃ saṃharantāṃ nakhanivaharucaḥ padmabhṛtpādajātāḥ // BuSto_39.4 //
XXbst-108u:2568: spaṣṭāvirbhūtanānāguṇanivahadhṛtādarśabimbacchavīnāṃ chāyā vaḥ pātu lokeśvaracaraṇabhuvāmunmayūukhā nakhānām // BuSto_39.5 //
XXbst-108u:2572: vaimalyātulyabimbopahasitaśaśinaḥ śātitadhvāntadoṣās toṣaṃ māṇikyadīpā iva dadatu nakhāḥ padmapāṇeḥ padorvaḥ // BuSto_39.7 //
XXbst-108u:2573: rājadrājīvapāṇernakhanivaharucāṃ pādapadmodbhavānām udbhedo bhedako 'sau bhavatu bhavabhiyāṃ nirbharāṇāṃ bharaṃ vaḥ /
XXbst-108u:2577: prārohā rohayantāṃ duradhigamamahāsaṃpaduccaiḥ padaṃ vaḥ // BuSto_39.9 //
XXbst-108u:2579: sāndrānandaṃ dadānāḥ sakalaśaśadharaśrībhṛto niṣkalaṅkās te vaścintāmacintyāḥ kamalakaranakhāḥ pādajātā jayantu // BuSto_39.10 //
XXbst-108u:2580: bhāsvatkhaṇḍendukhaṇḍairapacitiracanā kiṃ kṛtā śambhuneyaṃ nyastā ratnāvalī vā kimu niratiśayotkaṇṭhayā bodhilakṣmyā /
XXbst-108u:2581: devairdivyādbhutānāmasamasumanasāṃ lambitā mālikā nu prīyātpaṅktirnakhānāmiti janitamatirlokanāthāṅghrijā vaḥ // BuSto_39.11 //
XXbst-108u:2584: itthaṃ saṃjātahāsā iva rucinicayairdanturā ye durantā dhvāntacchedāya lokeśvaracaraṇabhavāste nakhā vo bhavantu // BuSto_39.12
XXbst-108u:2586: saṃsārākārakārāgṛhabṛhadudarodāraduḥkhaprakāraṃ ghoraṃ vaḥ saṃharantāṃ caraṇanakharucaḥ śrīkarāḥ padmapāṇeḥ // BuSto_39.13
XXbst-108u:2590: samyaksaṃbodhicetaḥ śaśina iva samudbhāsibhāsāṃ samūho nirdagdhakleśabhūtipracaya iva bṛhanmuktimārgānilāstaḥ
XXbst-108u:2591: vinyastādabhraśubhropalaphalaka iva krūramārairabhedyaḥ pāyādutprekṣito vo nakharucinikaraḥ pādajaḥ padmapāṇeḥ // BuSto_39.15 //
XXbst-108u:2592: vailakṣyeṇekṣaṇīyāḥ kṣaṇamasamatamaḥkṣepadakṣāḥ kṣapāṇāṃ nāthenākṣuṇṇapakṣakṣatinijavipadā niṣkalaṅkākṣayā ye /
XXbst-108u:2596: mitreṇāptodayena sphuṭamanuvalatālambhitātyantavṛddheḥ pāyāt sāpāyasarvavyasanaripumahāyānasaṃsiddhihetuḥ avrīḍaścūḍayā 'sau vahati paśupatiḥ kāmamardhendubhūṣāṃ
XXbst-108u:2598: dṛṣṭe 'smin so 'pi mogho maghavamaṇimahāmaulirityāptacittair yatkāntyācinti lokaiścaraṇanakhagaṇaḥ padmapāṇeḥ sa jīyāt // BuSto_39.18
XXbst-108u:2601: durvijñeyānubhāvo nikhilajagadatispaṣṭadṛṣṭiprakāśaḥ pādāmbhojāvalambī nakhakiraṇacayaḥ pātu vo buddhamauleḥ // BuSto_39.19 //
XXbst-108u:2608: mīlannīlāvabhāso nakharucivisaraḥ padmabhṛtpādapadmād udyaddugdhābdhivṛddhitrasadamaravadhūvīkṣito rakṣatād vaḥ // BuSto_39.21
XXbst-108u:2609: śobhā saṃbhāvyate 'smin himakaradhavalairnāmaraiścāmarairvā bhaktyārambheṇa rambhe parikirasi mudhā kiṃ nu karpūradhūlīḥ /
XXbst-108u:2610: kiṃ te puṣpaiḥ prakīrṇaiḥ śaciśucibhiriti svāminā svarbhuvāṃ vaḥ pūjāyāmabjapāṇernakharucinivahaḥ pādajo varṇito 'vyāt // BuSto_39.22 //
XXbst-108u:2613: lokeśāṅghrernakhānāmurukaranikare kiṃ mayetīva śīrṇaṃ śītāṃśoḥ pātu pūjācaturasurajanākīrṇakuṇḍacchalād vaḥ // BuSto_39.23 //
XXbst-108u:2616: svacchandācchacchaṭābhā jhaṭiti vighaṭanaṃ kurvatāṃ vo bhavasya //
XXbst-108u:2621: yatpūjāpārijāte valitamalikulaṃ mīlati śrīsaroje sevāsaktaḥ svayaṃbhūrmukulitanalinād duḥsthito yatra tasthau /
XXbst-108u:2624: kānto vibhrāntakāntāmarayuvatijanairarcito dṛṣṭipātaiḥ śubhraṃ vibhrāṇmṛṇālīnikaramiva nakhodyotanodbhūtaśobhaḥ
XXbst-108u:2625: kāmīvānalpakāmaprasaraparavaśānekacaryāpravṛttaḥ pādo vaḥ padmapāṇeravatu surapurīcandanāmandacarcaḥ ānandāmandabhārollasadamarakaraiḥ pārijāte vikīrṇe kālīyaḥ kālakūṭotkaṭapaṭala iva prollasadbhṛṅgasārthe
XXbst-108u:2629: niḥśeṣadvīpadīpaprabhavadatimahadvaibhavo buddhamauleḥ pāyāt pādo namasyadbhuvanapatiśiraścakravartī ciraṃ vaḥ // BuSto_39.30 //
XXbst-108u:2632: śakyaṃ māṇikyadāmnāmiha rūciranakhe śobhituṃ netyavādīd yatpūjāyāṃ sureśaḥ sa jayati caraṇo vārijavyagrapāṇeḥ // BuSto_39.31 //
XXbst-108u:2633: yo nāthasyaiva nāsīdapi khalu sugateḥ kāraṇaṃ janmabhājāṃ yasmin padmābhilāṣī na madhupanivahaḥ pakṣapātī jano 'pi /
XXbst-108u:2634: yenorvī nātigurvī natimatiguruṇā lambhitāpi trilokī lokaṃ pādaḥ sa pāyāt sugataśaśadharadyotavidyotamauleḥ yo 'līnāṃ pānadānādakṛta dhṛtamudaṃ saṃhatiṃ sevakānāṃ yasminnālaṃ vihīnaṃ na khalu haritatātyantaśobhopadhānam
XXbst-108u:2641: buddhālaṃkāramauleravikalakamalabhrāntibhṛdbhṛṅgamālā vācālā nirvicārā racayatu caraṇotsarpiṇī saṃpadaṃ vaḥ /
XXbst-108u:2642: sattvatrāṇaikakāryā sthiratarasucirāvasthitisthāpanārthaṃ vinyastā śṛṅkhaleva pracurakaruṇayā sthūlakālāyasasya // BuSto_39.35 //
XXbst-108u:2644: rakto rāgopaśānteratiśayabalavatkāraṇaṃ tāraṇāyāṃ saṃsārāmbhonidhervaḥ sugataśaśibhṛto 'pāstakhedo 'stu pādaḥ // BuSto_39.36
XXbst-108u:2645: jambhārerjṛmbhitāmbhoruharuciracaye cāpalenāpyalīnā nālaṃ lolāpi lolā harakaravihitānandakundotkare 'pi /
XXbst-108u:2650: acchīyānapyanaccho laghurapi na laghurlaṅghane diṅmukhānāṃ trailokyānandano 'pi prabalaparapuravyāpisantāpahetuḥ
XXbst-108u:2651: lāvaṇyālepalipto 'pyatiśayamadhuro vaidhurādherniroddhā pādoddyotaḥ kriyād vo jinarūcivikasanmālikāśekharasya rājīvai rājarājo harirapi haritairhāribhiḥ pārijātaiḥ kundaiḥ sānandamindurbahuvasuvisarairvāsavo bhāsamānaiḥ /
XXbst-108u:2652: prītaḥ pāśī palāśairiti vibudhajanaḥ prājyapūjāviśeṣaṃ yatrānuprāsakāvyāyitamatata sa vaḥ pātu pādo 'bjapāṇeḥ // BuSto_39.40 //
XXbst-108u:2653: bhānurbhāsāṃ vikāśe nutimakṛta nakheṣūnmukho nākanāthaḥ śarvaḥ śākhāgraparvaṇyavicalanayano 'pyantakaḥ prāntakāntau /
XXbst-108u:2654: yasyāsāmānyaśobhāviṣayamatiśayaṃ draṣṭumāsīdanīśo niḥśeṣaṃ divyalokaḥ sa jayati caraṇo buddhabimbāṅkamauleḥ samyaksaṃbuddhabhānusphuṭavikaṭajaṭāpuñjakuñjorumūrteḥ saṃsārāmbhodhimajjadgurutarajanatāmedinīstambhanasya
XXbst-108u:2655: bhūyād bhadrāya pādaḥ kamaladharagireḥ sevitaḥ siddhasārthaiḥ paryantodvāntakāntisravadaruṇamahādhātumannirjharo vaḥ // BuSto_39.42 //
XXbst-108u:2658: lokeśāṅaghridrumasya praṇatasurajanairmaulimālālavāle mūle saṃpādito 'vyānmaṇikalaśabhṛtaḥ svacchadhāmāmbusekaḥ // BuSto_39.43
XXbst-108u:2664: durvārāntaḥpraveśākṛśanarakapure dvāragāḍhārgalo vo bhūtyai lokeśapādo bhavajaladhisamullaṅghanaikaplavo 'stu // BuSto_39.45
XXbst-108u:2665: iti pādukādeśanā vṛtto nṛttaprakāraḥ sapadi vighaṭitā vādyavidyānavadyā no gītaṃ nāvagītaṃ kṛtarasaracanairnaiva bhāvairabhāvi /
XXbst-108u:2666: ityantaḥ smeraśākre sadasi na śakitā yatra pūjāpsarobhiḥ kartuṃ bhāvāturābhiḥ sa jayati janitātṛptirūpaḥ sarojī // BuSto_39.46 //
XXbst-108u:2671: kārāgārodare yaḥ smaraṇaśaraṇatāṃ kāraṇākātarāṇāṃ yātaḥ satkārakārī gurutarakaruṇaḥ pātu lokeśvaro vaḥ // BuSto_39.48 //
XXbst-108u:2674: ālambe yasya nīlotpalavimalamahākuṭṭimālīnalīlām ālīyante ladhīyaḥ sa jagati kamalī pālanāyāla mastu // BuSto_39.49 //
XXbst-108u:2677: pradhvaṃsaṃ sādhu dheyānniravadhi sa vidhiṃ buddhadhāro dhṛtervaḥ //
XXbst-108u:2679: krānto yannāmakaṣṭāṅkuśahatikṛpaṇaḥ kātareṇa karīndro lokeśaḥ sa prakāmopakaraṇakaruṇaḥ kāmakṛtyaṃ kriyād vaḥ // BuSto_39.51 //
XXbst-108u:2681: yannāmāśīviṣeśadviṣi viśati viṣāṃ dhīṣu naśyantyanīśā lokeśaḥ so 'stu viśvaśrayadativiṣamakleśarāśeḥ śamāya // BuSto_39.52 //
XXbst-108u:2683: yogairyugyopayogānagami mṛgapatiryadgaṇodgītiyogād duryogaṃ vaḥ sa yogī sthagayatu sugatāsaṅgituṅgottamāṅgaḥ bhūyo 'pāyānumeyaḥ kṣatadayahṛdayo bhīvidhāyī vihāya
XXbst-108u:2685: sadyogopāyamāyāmaya iva vilayaṃ yātavān yātavīryo yatpādadhyāyineyaḥ sa sugatanilayo jāyatāṃ vo jayāya // BuSto_39.54 //
XXbst-108u:2688: yatsevāsādhunāvā dviṣadasamasamitsārasenāsravantīṃ sotsāhāḥ saṃcarante sukhamasukhamasau saṃhriyād vaḥ sarojī // BuSto_39.55
XXbst-108u:2690: dambholirbhītibhājāmabhavadabhipatannāśunābhāvabhūmir bhakteryasya prabhāvāt sa bhavatu bhavabhidvo bhṛtāmbhojaśobhī //
XXbst-108u:2693: rdhīmānnādhervidheyo dhiyamavatu sa vo bodhaye buddhamūrdhā // BuSto_39.57
XXbst-108u:2696: yatpādādhītiśakteḥ kupitamatiratiprītimāyāti bhūter vyāghātodbhūtiheturjinavṛṣavasatiḥ saṃhriyād vaḥ sa bhītim // BuSto_39.58
XXbst-108u:2697: brahmā jihmāyito 'bhūdagururapi guruḥ khaṇḍitākhaṇḍaloktir viṣṇustūṣṇīmadhṛṣṭo vacanaviracane vītagarvo 'pi śarvaḥ /
XXbst-108u:2698: tuṣṭāstuṣṭūṣavo 'pi sphuṭamiti vibudhā no budhā yadguṇoktau sa śrīmānabjapāṇirjayati jinamanogocarāntarguṇaughaḥ dhātrā citraṃ caritraṃ suraripuripuṇā satrinetreṇa netre gotrāmitreṇa gotraṃ gatirapi guruṇā rātripeṇāpi gātram /
XXbst-108u:2701: yasmin brahmā bahutvaṃ bahubahumatavānānanānāṃ nijānāṃ skando 'pyānandagarbhaṃ nutiṣu natikṛtau nāganātho 'pi mūrdhnaḥ /
XXbst-108u:2704: khedī khe dīptaraśmiḥ kila viphalamasāvadhvanīnodhvanīno lokālokārthamāste nanu kamalabhṛto dīptatāpaḥ pratāpaḥ /
XXbst-108u:2705: dhīrairdhīrairakāri stutiriti vihitollāsabhāsāṃ sabhāsāṃ yasyāryasyāstu tasmājjagati kṛtaripukṣiprasādaḥ prasādaḥ // BuSto_39.62 //
XXbst-108u:2706: nyastā yasminnamasye natirapi nitarāmunnatiḥ puṇyadhāmnāṃ niḥsāmānyaikamānye 'pacitirupacitirbhūyasī bhaktibhājām /
XXbst-108u:2707: dhyānasthānasya yasya smṛtirapi sahasā vismṛtirbhūtabhīteḥ so 'nantācintyaloke vihitahitapatho lokanātho 'vatādvaḥ // BuSto_39.63 //
XXbst-108u:2709: hārī hārīraṇāsau balavati viphalābhīṣu rājīṣu rājī /
XXbst-108u:2710: cakre cakreṇa nārthaṃ haririti janatā nūnamāheti heti-
XXbst-108u:2712: lokātotaṃ dadhānaḥ sukhamapi jagatāṃ tīvraduḥkhena duḥkhī nityaṃ nityānurakto 'pyaśaraṇakṛpaṇaprāṇabhṛdyogayuktaḥ
XXbst-108u:2717: kvāsau sarvatra maitrī kva viṣamabahalakleśavidveṣidāhaḥ kva prauḍhā muktiśaktiḥ kva ca dṛḍhakaruṇāpāśaniṣpandabandhaḥ
XXbst-108u:2718: kvopekṣāpakṣapātaḥ kvaparahitakṛtivyagratā tadvicitraṃ citraṃ rājīvapāṇeścaritamatijagajjāyatāṃ jyotijidvaḥ // BuSto_39.67 //
XXbst-108u:2719: sarvāgraḥ sarvarūpaprathanapṛthunayaḥ sarvadā sarvanāthaḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvathā yo vinayavidhimahāsarvagurvarthasiddhyai
XXbst-108u:2720: sarvaiḥ sātotagarvairgurumahimaguṇaiḥ kharvayan sarvagarvān sarvaḥ sarvaprado vaḥ saphalayatu rūcīḥ sarvavinmaulirurvīḥ // BuSto_39.68
XXbst-108u:2721: īśaḥ svāmī prajānāṃ patiramaragururlokapālo mahendro bhāsvān dattāridaṇḍaḥ parajayabalijid vittado jaitrapāśaḥ /
XXbst-108u:2722: ityantarhāsagarbhaṃ bhaṇati parijane 'nvarthanāmnāṃ nijānāṃ pātre yatrānulajjairnatamamaragaṇairabjapāṇiḥ sa jīyāt // BuSto_39.69 //
XXbst-108u:2723: varyāryāṇāṃ vareṇyo varaparavidhurotsāraṇā saṃvaro vo durvāraiḥ sāramārairamitakaradharo durdharo vairivīraiḥ /
XXbst-108u:2726: nityodyukte 'tiśakte prabhavati nalinodbhāsi haste samasto nāthī saṃsārayādaḥpatipathapathako loka ityākalayya /
XXbst-108u:2727: yasmin vinyasya bhāraṃ laghuralaghukṛpo viśvadīpaṃ prapede buddho 'vandhyapratijñākṛtadhṛtividhṛtirnirvṛtiṃ so 'vatādvaḥ //
XXbst-108u:2728: uccairūḍho garīyān sugata iva jagatkāryasaṃbhārabhāro nyastā haste praśastā nija iva kamalālaṃkṛtirbhaktibhājām
XXbst-108u:2729: nirvāṇaṃ nārakāgnernicaya iva ciraṃ prāpitaḥ sattvasārthaḥ tīvrakleśaprabandho jana iva śamito yena pāyāt sa yuṣmān // BuSto_39.72 //
XXbst-108u:2732: vītakrodho 'pi duṣṭāśayadamanabudhakrodhanityānubandhaḥ saṃbuddhodbhāsimauliḥ sa jayati mahatāṃ cintanīyo 'pyacintyaḥ //
XXbst-108u:2735: yenābaddhā jaṭā no jagadahitahativyāpṛtenāpi kakṣā dakṣo 'sau rakṣatādvaḥ kupitayamamukhālokanāllokanāthaḥ śeṣāśaṅkī cakampe bhavasalilanidhiḥ kleśasārthaiḥ pralīnaṃ viśrāntaṃ bodhisattvairmunirapi śuśubhe ślāghyanirvāṇalīlaḥ /
XXbst-108u:2737: vyāyāme sa prakāmaṃ śamayatu sugatāvāsamaulirmalaṃ vaḥ // BuSto_39.75 //
XXbst-108u:2740: nighnaḥ krīto 'tha bhīto balavadiva yayā nirvikāro niyuktaḥ sā nāthasyātigurvī prabhuravatu kṛpā niṣkṛpādantakādvaḥ // BuSto_39.76 //
XXbst-108u:2741: bhūmirnaivābhibhūtermṛdutaramapi yallokadhātūnanantān atyantāvīryavīryaṃ yugapadapi bhṛśaṃ bhāsayaṃstrāsaśāntyai /
XXbst-108u:2742: khadyotodyotaleśānukṛtivilisitāśeṣatejasvitejas tejo lokeśvaraṃ vo haratu hṛdi bhavadbhūrimohāndhakāram niḥśeṣākāśadhāturjana iva janitāpūritāśaḥ samantāt prārabdhaḥ sarvabhāsāmiva niratiśayāpāyarāśervilopaḥ
XXbst-108u:2743: sārdhaṃ sāndrāndhakāraiḥ śamamagami mahānṛddhimānmānimāro yenodbhāsaḥ sa bhūyāt sarasirūhabhṛto bhūtaye jāyatāṃ vaḥ // BuSto_39.78
XXbst-108u:2745: nānānantācalādivyavahitaviṣayodbhāsane śaktidhārī lokeśodbhāsa ekopyamaragaṇanibho bhībhide vaḥ sa bhūyāt // BuSto_39.79 //
XXbst-108u:2746: saṃpannāśeṣasattvapracurajalacarecchāsukhaṃ yatra dūraṃ durlaṅghaye yāntyadhastād giraya iva janānarthadustīrthyasārthāḥ /
XXbst-108u:2747: durvāro 'sau samantāt pṛthubhavabhuvanābhāvasaṃrambhajṛmbhī bhīdāvāgnipraśāntyai karakamalavibhāmbhonidhirjṛmbhatādvaḥ nirvāṇo nārakāgniḥ kimiti yadi vineyeṣu dharmāmṛtaugho-
XXbst-108u:2748: rāśirbaddho jaṭānāṃ yadi gatirahitaḥ kiṃ samaho ripūṇām /
XXbst-108u:2749: mardhāgāre garīyān yadi vasati jino bandhurā kiṃ trilokī nāthasyetthaṃ vicitrā vyavahṛtirahitaṃ hantu vo lokabandhoḥ // BuSto_39.81
XXbst-108u:2752: dhvāntāntardhānabhānurbhavatu bhavabhide deśanā śāsanī vaḥ // BuSto_39.82
XXbst-108u:2755: utsādaḥ sapramādonmadajanavipadāṃ kovidānāṃ prasādo bhāvānutpādavādo jayati jinavapuḥ pādasaṃpādamauleḥ trastavyastāriśastraṃ trayi jagati cakāsti stuto yadgabhasti-
XXbst-108u:2756: stomo vistīrṇatoyaṃ marunilayasadāṃ vistaradhvastatāpaḥ sa stādastāhitāstro balivalikuliśaḥ padmahastasya hasto -
XXbst-108u:2760: bhadro lokeśvarasya praṇayimadhukarākarṣadānaughavarṣī hastastamberamo vo bhavaripunagarībhañjanāyālamastu satkoṣaṃ sannidhānaṃ ghanarucijinatāvāñchitācchedasiddhau yadyātaṃ śātakoṭimanukṛtimahitatrāsisatpatrakoṭi
XXbst-108u:2761: samyaksaṃbodhilakṣmīkṛtavasatiguṇaślāghayaivāvimuktaṃ muktestatkāraṇaṃ vaḥ karakamalamalaṃ lokanāthasya bhūyāt // BuSto_39.86 //
XXbst-108u:2763: satpadmaṃ bhūtivāñcchāvinihitamanasāṃ sādhusevāpadaṃ yat tallokeśasya yuṣmān paṭurucipaṭalīrājirājīvamavyāt nānāduḥkhapratānāṃ tanukiraṇaghanottāpanakleśabhānu-
XXbst-108u:2765: glāniṃ mā gādahīnaṃ tadakhilabhuvanānyūnabhānūdvitānaṃ līnaṃ lokeśapāṇau nalinamamalinaṃ mlānimeno nayedvaḥ // BuSto_39.88 //
XXbst-108u:2766: sthāmnaḥ sthānaṃ mahimno mahadudayapadaṃ dhāmadhāmnāṃ prathimnas trāsāvāso ripūṇāṃ durabhibhavabhavādbhībhidodbhūtibhūmiḥ
XXbst-108u:2767: kāntaṃ śobhāniśāntaṃ vasatiratijagadvīryavistārirāśer lokeśasyāstu bāhurbahujagadahitocchedanācaṇḍadaṇḍaḥ yallāvaṇyāmṛtaughaṃ kṣaradapi janitātaṅkamevāhitānāṃ tṛptiṃ naiva prayacchatyatha punaratanuprīṇanaṃ locanānām /
XXbst-108u:2768: śobhāgāraṃ viśobhīkṛtasakalajagadbhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇānāṃ tadbhuyādekacīraṃ sukhamasukhanude bhāsvadambhojino vaḥ // BuSto_39.90 //
XXbst-108u:2769: mlānaṃ rūpābhimānairjagati saphalatāṃ locanaiḥ puṇyabhājāṃ yātaṃ ghātaṃ tu tṛṣṇātatitaralatarairyatra lāvaṇyasindhau /
XXbst-108u:2770: manye 'saṃkhyaiḥ śaśāṅkaprabhṛtibhiratulaṃ kāntimadbhiḥ kṛtaṃ syād ekaṃ yadyāsyamasyāpyatijayi jayatāṃ tanmukhaṃ padmapāṇeḥ // BuSto_39.91 //
XXbst-108u:2771: yasmin vidveṣabhājāmaviratavilasatkāntitoyaughameghaiḥ saṃvṛttaṃ dāhadāyi sphuṭataramasakṛddurdinaṃ dehināṃ tu /
XXbst-108u:2772: dhautā dhvastānubandhā bahulamalamaṣīpaṅkalepaprabandhāḥ tadbuddhāgāramūrddhāmukhamatisukhadaṃ stādvicitrakriyaṃ vaṃ // BuSto_39.92
XXbst-108u:2779: yāsāṃ baddho vimuktiṃ gamayati niyatāmujjhitānyādhivāso niḥsāmānyāṃ vibhūṣāṃ janayati vapuṣā yāsu nātho 'mitābhaḥ /
XXbst-108u:2780: sarvāmodacchido yā nirupamavahalāmodaliptākhilāśā laukeśyo 'vaśyalabhyāṃ mṛtimativikaṭāstā jaṭā vo harantu // BuSto_39.95 //
XXbst-108u:2781: saṃghāto no jaṭānāmakhilajanamanobandhane pāśarāśir lāvaṇyaṃ nāpi duḥkhānalavikalajagajjīvanīyo 'mṛtaughaḥ /
XXbst-108u:2782: nāmbhojaṃ duṣṭadamyāntakaturagakaśākleśadoṣātimoṣaḥ pratyāśā poṣasiddhiṃ diśatu jinaśaśiśleṣikeśaḥ śriyo vaḥ // BuSto_39.96 //
XXbst-108u:2785: daṣṭauṣṭhaṃ duṣṭadṛṣṭijvalitamanuhayagrīvamābaddhalakṣmyā jātā lokeśvarī vaḥ kṣaṇamatulakṛpākātarā dṛṣṭiravyāt // BuSto_39.97 //
XXbst-108u:2786: lopaṃ lokaḥ prayāti sphuṭamakhilamahābhūbhṛtāmadya tūrṇaṃ cūrṇībhāvo dharāṇāmapi jalanidhayaḥ śoṣamāyāntyanantāḥ /

XXbst-108u:2790: lokasyārticchidā yaiḥ svayamatulakṛpaivābjino nirgatā stāt tārā saṃsārakārodaraguruvilasatkāraṇāhāriṇī vaḥ // BuSto_39.99 //
XXbst-108u:2792: gambhīrodgāriṇībhirnigaditagarimāgeyapūgālpabhāgaḥ samyaggamyaḥ samagro 'vatu sugatagirāmabjino vo guṇaughaḥ // BuSto_39.100

XXbst-108u:3055: lakṣmīḥ siddhagaṇāśca pādukamukhāḥ siddhāstathā vāriṇāṃ stambhaścāpi raṇāṅgaṇe gajaghaṭāstambhastathā mohanam /

XXbst-108u:3064: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 48:
XXbst-108u:3065: Mahogratārāstutiḥ om namaḥ śrī ugratārāyai prakaṭavikaṭadaṃṣṭrā ghorarudrāṭṭahāsā naraśirakṛtamālā meghagambhīrarāvā /

XXbst-108u:3098: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 49:
XXbst-108u:3099: Maṅgalaṣoḍaśastutiḥ om namaḥ samantabhadrāya yena puṇyāṭavīsthenāneke śāsanavartinaḥ /
XXbst-108u:3100: divodāsādayo bhūpāḥ sa no rakṣatu mārajit // BuSto_49.1 //
XXbst-108u:3102: grahānadamayad yo vai sa no rakṣatu tadbhayāt // BuSto_49.2 //
XXbst-108u:3104: prāvrājayat sumuktyarthaṃ sa no rakṣatu muktidaḥ // BuSto_49.3 //
XXbst-108u:3106: durbhikṣabhayato nityaṃ sa no rakṣatu śākyarāṭ // BuSto_49.4 //
XXbst-108u:3108: cakraṃ dūrīkṛtaṃ yena sa no rakṣatu mātṛvān // BuSto_49.5 //
XXbst-108u:3110: kāśīyān prākarodāḍhyān sa no rakṣatu kāñcanaiḥ // BuSto_49.6 //
XXbst-108u:3111: bhūtvā yaḥ sudhano nāma nidhānaṃ samadarśayat /
XXbst-108u:3112: dāridrayaduḥkhato nityaṃ sa no rakṣatu sarvavit // BuSto_49.7 //
XXbst-108u:3114: tattadrogabhayānnityaṃ sa no rakṣatu dharmarāṭ // BuSto_49.8 //
XXbst-108u:3116: prakāśayannije dehe sa no rakṣatu dharmavit // BuSto_49.9 //
XXbst-108u:3118: bandhanānmocayāmāsa sa no rakṣatu sarvavit // BuSto_49.10 //
XXbst-108u:3119: gopān rarakṣa yo devyāḥ prabhāvaṃ saṃprakāśayan /
XXbst-108u:3120: vahnidāhāribhayataḥ sa no rakṣatu bhītihā // BuSto_49.11 //
XXbst-108u:3121: yo 'ndhībhūtāṃ mātaraṃ svāṃ cūḍāratnaṃ jale vyadhāt /
XXbst-108u:3122: divyanetrān janān kṛtvā sa no rakṣatu netradaḥ // BuSto_49.12 //
XXbst-108u:3124: sarvalakṣaṇasampannaṃ sa no rakṣatu sarvadaḥ // BuSto_49.13 //
XXbst-108u:3126: santatisthitikurvāṇaḥ sa no rakṣatu sthairyakṛt // BuSto_49.14 //
XXbst-108u:3128: rarakṣa dhāraṇīvijñaḥ sa no rakṣatu nirviṣaḥ // BuSto_49.15 //
XXbst-108u:3130: kapilān prasthito yo 'sau sa no rakṣatu santatam // BuSto_49.16 //

XXbst-108u:3133: Maṅgalāṣṭakam mañjuśrīrlokanātho jinavaramakuṭo jambhalo vajrasattvaḥ maitreyo vajrapāṇiḥ sukhakarakamalo rāhulo bhadrapālaḥ /

XXbst-108u:3217: tava saumyatayā 'pyabhibhūtatamo na virājati śītakaro gagane /

XXbst-108u:3242: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 55:
XXbst-108u:3244: pratijñātaṃ samutpāde trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.1 //
XXbst-108u:3246: bandhuvargaiḥ parityaktaṃ trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.2 //
XXbst-108u:3248: indrajālasamā dṛṣṭāstrāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.3 //

XXbst-108u:3252: andhībhūto 'smyahaṃ nātha trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.5 //
XXbst-108u:3254: durlaṅghyaṃ ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.6 //
XXbst-108u:3255: dharmādharma na vijñātaṃ gamyāgamyaṃ na veditam /
XXbst-108u:3256: acetano 'smyahaṃ nātha trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.7 //
XXbst-108u:3258: pacyāmi narake ghore trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.8 //
XXbst-108u:3260: kṛtā mayā sattvahiṃsā trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.9 //
XXbst-108u:3262: veṣṭitaṃ karmasūtreṇa trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.10 //
XXbst-108u:3264: īdṛśaṃ jīvitaṃ loke trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.11 //
XXbst-108u:3266: panthānaṃ nātra paśyāmi trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.12 //
XXbst-108u:3268: rājahatyāṃ tadā manye trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.13 //
XXbst-108u:3270: gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ kasya trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata // BuSto_55.14 //
XXbst-108u:3274: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 56:
XXbst-108u:3277: na ca nāma tvayā kiñcid dṛṣṭaṃ bauddhena cakṣuṣā /
XXbst-108u:3278: anuttarā ca te nātha dṛṣṭistattvārthadarśinī // BuSto_56.2 //
XXbst-108u:3279: na boddhā na ca boddhavyamastīha paramārthataḥ /
XXbst-108u:3281: na tvayotpāditaḥ kaścid dharmo nāpi nirodhitaḥ /
XXbst-108u:3289: na te 'sti saktiḥ skandheṣu na dhātvāyataneṣu ca /
XXbst-108u:3291: sattvasaṃjñā ca te nātha sarvathā na pravartate /
XXbst-108u:3292: duḥkhārteṣu ca sattveṣu tvamatīva kṛpātmakaḥ // BuSto_56.9 //
XXbst-108u:3294: iti nānāvikalpeṣu buddhistava na sajjate // BuSto_56.10 //

XXbst-108u:3309: śauṣīryo nāsti te kāyo māṃsāsthirudhiro na ca /
XXbst-108u:3311: nāmayo nāśuciḥ kāye kṣuttṛṣṇāsambhavo na ca /
XXbst-108u:3312: tvayā lokānuvṛttyarthaṃ darśitā laukikī kriyā // BuSto_56.19 //
XXbst-108u:3317: nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ kāyastava dharmamayo jina /
XXbst-108u:3321: na te 'sti manyanā nātha na vikalpo na ceñjanā /
XXbst-108u:3322: anābhogena te loke buddhakṛtyaṃ pravartate // BuSto_56.24 //
XXbst-108u:3326: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 57:
XXbst-108u:3327: Pañcākṣarastotram namo buddhāya na jāto na mṛtaścaiva na rūpo nāpi rūpavān /
